data.name: Issue 22
data.value: 第22期

data.name: Spring 2024
data.value: 2024年春季刊

data.name: How your gifts are transforming lives in Shanghai
data.value: 您的捐赠如何改变人们在上海的生活

data.name: Re:news
data.value: 日新新闻

data.name: Give now
data.value: 现在捐赠

data.name: I feel like I’m home.
data.value: 我觉得自己仿佛回到了家

data.name: Our latest arrival at the Yunnan Career Hub is an old friend. Ma Long recently returned to the Renewal Center in Shanghai having lost his job as a security guard. His employers discovered that he couldn’t read or write, which is now a requirement almost everywhere you go. Along with his very poor eyesight, Ma Long faces huge obstacles in gaining long-term employment and stability.
data.value: 最近有一位老朋友来到了我们的云南就业培训中心。原先在上海做保安的马龙由于不识字，被公司解雇了，因此又回到了日新。无论在哪儿，读写能力现在似乎都是一项必要的技能。而且马龙的视力也很差，这让他更加难以找到一份长期且稳定的工作。

data.name: Bound to struggle from the day he was born, Ma Long lost his father when he was just a baby – and his mother, after giving birth at home, abandoned him. This is part of the reason he never learned to read or write or was even issued a hukou (national identity card).
data.value: 马龙的人生一直很艰难——母亲当年在家中生下了他后立刻就抛弃了他，父亲在他牙牙学语的阶段也撒手人寰。从某种程度上说，这些导致了他从未上过学也没有登记过户口。

data.name: Now with contact lenses and literacy training, Ma Long can soon qualify for a more satisfying job.
data.value: 有了隐形眼镜和扫盲培训，马龙很快就能获得一份更满意的工作。

data.name: But since reconnecting with Renewal, all that has changed. Not only does Ma Long now have a much-needed hukou thanks to support from friends like you, we’ve helped him get corrective lenses, and he’s finally in literacy training. He’s also learning to cook and regularly prepares full meals for our communal suppers.
data.value: 不过再次来到日新中心后，马龙的生活也彻底改变了。在您的支持下，现在的他不仅有了梦寐以求的户口，还带上了矫正眼镜，参加了扫盲培训班，正在学习烹饪的他也会经常为我们准备晚餐。

data.name: Ma Long works incredibly hard, but also needs longer-term support. That's why we’re glad your gifts are giving him a place where he can rebuild his life and see a brighter future!
data.value: 马龙正在发奋努力，但他需要长期的支持。因此，我们非常感激你的捐赠，是您为他提供了一个场所，让他能在这里重建他的人生并有机会拥有一个美好的未来！

data.name: The same, but different ...
data.value: 一样的日新，不一样的关怀……

data.name: Women are finding friendship, help and support
data.value: 女性在这里收获了友谊、帮助和支持

data.name: By Renewal’s women’s services volunteers
data.value: 由日新女性援助项目志愿者撰写

data.name: Because Renewal can’t offer a separate space for women, we give them a separate day.
data.value: 日新无法为女性提供一个独立的空间，因此我们选择为她们提供一个专属的日子

data.name: Chairman Mao once said, “Women hold up half the sky.” But a homeless woman in one of the world’s largest cities is bound to feel the sky is falling on her. While men find safety in numbers and often put on a brave face, women on the streets feel vulnerable and terrified. Constantly looking out for thieves and attackers can cause huge emotional strain.
data.value: 毛主席曾经说过：“妇女能顶半边天。”但是在上海这样一个国际大都市，一个无家可归的女性往往会感觉她的天塌了。露宿街头的男性通常不觉得危险，还显得满不在乎，女性却觉得自己弱小无助。她们一直小心提防着小偷与暴力分子，精神长期处在巨大的压力之下。

data.name: All this means that the women who visit Renewal’s drop-in center during the hours set aside for them every Thursday need to see a woman greeting them. They also come hoping for a little more privacy, greater security, a listening ear and just a bit more time – even if they only need a few more minutes to pick out a clean new shirt or coat.
data.value: 由于这些原因，每周四当她们来到日新中心时，总是期待能由女性来接待她们。她们渴望拥有一些私密、安全的空间和一个愿意倾听的人。她们也希望可以在中心里待得久一些，尽管拿衣服换衣服只需要几分钟而已。

data.name: We feel glad – even privileged – to “hold up half the sky” for these women who feel beaten down. The suffering they’ve already endured inspires us to make sure each one gets the care and attention she needs. We might be meeting strangers and newcomers, but this place feels like home – so many people come here to give and receive love.
data.value: 我们很高兴——甚至很荣幸——可以为崩溃的她们“顶起半边天”。她们已经承受了太多，所以我会尽力确保她们每一个人都能得到所需的关怀与关注。她们中不乏陌生人和第一次来中心的人，但我们这里就像家一样，所以人们总可以在这儿收获和给与爱。

data.name: Most women only need a hot meal, a shower, or a new item or two of clothing to replace ones that are old and worn out. But as you may have heard, one woman gave birth here. Where would that mother and baby be today without the caring support another only a woman can give?
data.value: 大多数女性来这儿只是为了吃顿饭、洗个澡，或者拿一两件换洗的衣物，去替换掉身上已经穿旧穿破的。但您或许也听说过，曾经有一位女性在这里生下了宝宝。如果日新没有女性员工去关怀支持她们的话，今天的她们又将何去何从呢？

data.name: Although lots has changed since I started helping at the Renewal Center nearly 15 years ago, I still really enjoy being a sister to the men who come here for help. It’s also amazing to share the load with Jimmy, Hanson and the team of guys who work tirelessly to make sure your support changes women’s lives!
data.value: 日新成立至今已经有十五年了，尽管很多东西都已改变，但我们仍然非常乐意像姐妹一样去支持那些前来寻求帮助的人们。能与Jimmy、海生和其他辛勤工作的团队成员分忧解难、确保您的捐赠实实在在地改变了女性们的生活，也是我们莫大的荣幸。

data.name: Their only son was recently married, but despite having a tiny income, Xie Lu’de and her husband can’t afford a place to live because rents have drastically increased since the COVID-19 lockdown finally came to an end. They are also still repaying a loan they took out when all their investments were lost.
data.value: 他们唯一的儿子最近刚刚结婚。尽管有着微薄的退休金，谢路德和丈夫却无法找到一个居住的地方，因为疫情结束后的租房价格一路飙升。同时，他们还需要定期归还投资失败所欠下的贷款。

data.name: It happened to Yan Shipin, 45. He drops into the Renewal Center for the occasional hot meal, but also relies on the showers and clothing exchange to stay presentable enough to look for a job. In the meantime, he sleeps in the airport for safety and warmth – and because there’s less of a chance he’ll be told to move on.
data.value: 这个人就是45岁的颜士平。他偶尔会来到日新中心接受我们提供的午餐，但对他而言最重要的是淋浴和换洗衣服的服务，因为那可以使他重获找工作的自信。同时，他晚上都在虹桥机场过夜，因为那里比较安全和温暖，而且那里很少会有人赶他离开。

data.name: Our Spring Festival meal includes traditional dumplings, or jiaozi, all handmade by volunteers.
data.value: 我们的春节餐包括由志愿者们亲手包的饺子。

data.name: Ma Long first visited the new drop-in center back in 2008
data.value: 马龙第一次来到服务站还是在2008年

data.name: My gift for meals and training
data.value: 我愿为提供温暖的饭菜和培训而捐款

data.name: You’d be amazed to see what a small gift can do. The annual “summer slump” can put vital programs at risk, but friends like you are keeping the doors open as you continue to give at this crucial time.
data.value: 小小的捐赠拥有大大的力量！正是您这样的朋友在关键时刻伸出的援手，让我们至关重要的项目得继续下去。

data.name: Tao Dezheng had no choice but to leave his family and search for work
data.value: 陶德正不得不离开家人去寻找工作

data.name: That man sleeping alone in the airport concourse – is he waiting for a flight? You might be surprised to find that not only does he not have a ticket, he doesn’t have a passport, a wallet or even a few coins buy his next meal.
data.value: 有个人正独自睡在机场大厅——他是在等候他的航班吗？了解真相后你会惊奇地发现，他不但没有机票、没有护照、没有钱包，甚至连买下一顿饭所需的几枚硬币都没有。

data.name: The good news for Zhang and many others is your amazing support. Your gifts are a lifeline to people who have no other help to meet their basic needs, so we and the people you reach every day are deeply grateful for you and the gifts you give. We are also very aware how much we depend on your financial generosity – and donations like clean, wearable, used or new clothes – to give people a better chance of finding work and making a new start in life.
data.value: 您的支持对张明和许多其他人而言就是最好的消息。对于那些生活的基本需求都无法得到满足的人们而言，您的捐赠能够拯救他们的生命，我们和这些受助者们都对您怀有衷心的感激。我们也清楚地知道，您慷慨的资金捐赠，以及捐助的各种干净、实用的衣物，是我们得以帮助无家可归者找到工作，进而开始新生的最大依靠。

data.name: The Renewal Center gives Yan Shipin, 45, the confidence to look for a job.
data.value: 日新中心使45岁的颜士平重新具备了找工作的信心

data.name: Now that the drop-in center has reopened, we will be looking for more trainees. One big concern is that people are already looking for coats and warm clothes as we see cold weather on the horizon.
data.value: 一旦服务站重新投入运营，我们也会开始寻找更多的培训生。不过目前我们比较担心的是，随着严寒天气的逼近，人们越来越需要外套和温暖的冬装了。

data.name: The Renewal Center’s training program is often the key to successful life-change, and is open to anyone who is willing to put in serious work towards finding full-time employment.
data.value: 日新中心的培训项目通常是成功改变生活的关键，任何有意愿努力寻求一份全职工作的人都可参加。

data.name: Because we serve meals every day, can you help provide more essential food this spring? It will definitely attract more people into our training program.
data.value: 由于每天都需要供应食物，您是否可以在今年春天支持我们提供更多的食物？这样一定能吸引到更多的人参加我们的培训项目。

data.name: Yan used to be a part-time attendant in the public baths, but since they closed, he now scrapes together whatever money he can collecting plastic bottles to recycle. Your kindness makes a difference to him – and will have a life-changing impact on the next person in need. As Yan says, “The clean clothes I receive at the Renewal Center give me the dignity to ride on public transport and interview for jobs.”
data.value: 颜士平曾经在公共浴室做过临时工。但现在浴室关门了，他只能依靠捡塑料瓶换取一点点收入。您的慷慨捐赠帮助了他——也将对下一位需要帮助的无家可归者产生改变人生的影响。正如颜士平所说：“日新中心为我提供的干净衣服使我有了自信，也让我敢去坐公交地铁和找工作了。”

data.name: You can help the homeless hiding in plain sight
data.value: 您的资助给无家可归者带来了自信

data.name: Xie Lu’de grew up in Jiangsu province bordering Shanghai, where her Christian grandmother named her Lu’de after Martin Luther. As a young woman, she worked in manufacturing assembly until the factory she worked in shut down. To make matters worse, she and her husband lost their home and money when the savings and loan they trusted with their investments collapsed. He now struggles with mental health problems.
data.value: 谢路德的童年在靠近上海的一个江苏小城里度过。她的外婆是个基督徒，因此特意为她取名为“路德”。她年轻的时候在厂里从事机械组装的工作，但后来工厂倒闭了。更糟糕的是，她和丈夫投资理财的公司一夜之间人间蒸发，他们为此失去了自己的房子和所有的积蓄，甚至还背负了贷款。目前，她的丈夫又患上了一些大脑方面的疾病。

data.name: A hot meal and shower costs 15 RMB ($2.30). Add a day’s job training for a total of 60 RMB ($9.20).
data.value: 一顿温暖的饭菜和和一次淋浴的费用是15元人民币，加上一天的职业培训，总计60 元人民币。

data.name: Your gifts mean Tao doesn’t have to beg for food.
data.value: 您的捐赠使陶德正不必再去乞讨食物

data.name: One thing you should know is how glad I am that friends like you give generously. It’s vitally important to have ongoing support, but you are helping to meet our needs as they arise. I was especially grateful to see that donations toward our recent Spring Festival were on a similar level to the response for our matching grant appeal back in October.
data.value: 希望您能明白，有您这样的朋友慷慨解囊，我们感到多么地高兴。能获得持续的帮助对我们来说至关重要，而您的支持恰恰满足了我们的需要。我们发现，春节期间我们收到的捐款数额与去年十月份配捐活动期间收到的数额不相上下，对此我们充满感激。

data.name: Homecoming for a longtime friend
data.value: 老朋友回来了

data.name: Your help has never been so important
data.value: 您此时的帮助对我们而言更加重要

data.name: Anyone hearing her story for the first time would wonder how she faces each new day, but Xie Lu’de remains optimistic – and extremely grateful. “The winter is cold, and all you can do is cover up with a thicker blanket. But the Renewal Center is so warm and cozy. I want to thank you and your supporters for all your love, help and guidance.”
data.value: 每一个初次听到她的故事的人都会为此感到揪心，甚至不知道她如何有勇气面对每一天的生活。但谢路德却非常乐观，同时也充满了感恩：“冬天的火车站很冷，我们只能一直裹着厚厚的毯子。但日新中心里却非常温暖、舒适，我想感谢你们和所有捐助者们的爱心、帮助和指引。”

data.name: Because we serve meals every day, can you help provide more essential food this spring? It will definitely attract more people into our training program.
data.value: 由于每天都需要供应食物，您是否可以在今年春天支持我们提供更多的食物？这样一定能吸引到更多的人参加我们的培训项目。

data.name: We’ve noticed a recent rise in the number of homeless guests, so every yuan and dollar really count right now. Also, you might already know that Hanson and Jimmy are working towards opening an agricultural program for Renewal trainees in Yunnan province.
data.value: 近期，无家可归的人数有所上升，因此每一元对我们来说都意义重大。另外，也许您已经知道，海生和Jimmy此刻正在云南为日新的培训生们筹备一个农业项目。

data.name: This means they’ve both been away, but you’ll be relieved to know that our Renewal is in good hands. A super graduate named Yang Wenyin has been cooking up a storm and marshalling volunteers to keep our drop-in center welcoming more and more guests.
data.value: 这意味着他们二人此刻都不在上海！但请别担心，日新仍有人在悉心打理——我们的超级毕业生杨文寅。凭借着自身高超的厨艺，以及对志愿者们的妥善安排，杨文寅正在日新服务着一批又一批的访客。
